name: Markus Küttner
background: Markus Küttner serves as Head of RTL Entertainment at RTL. Focus areas: Overall factual entertainment strategy. They are looking for: Commercial factual formats with broad appeal; returning formats with strong hooks. Overall network strategy: RTL seeks commercial factual content with broad mainstream appeal that delivers emotional impact and engaging storytelling through relatable characters and familiar institutions.
